contract_description: The Supplier shall provide the following products/services to the Buyer: Product X2, Product Y2, Product Z2.
objective: To provide products/services to the Buyer with agreed-upon pricing and terms.
pricing_and_payment_terms: Product X2: $15 per unit, Product Y2: $25 per unit, Product Z2: $35 per unit. Payment Terms: The Buyer shall make payments to the Supplier within 45 days from the receipt of a valid invoice. Payment Method: Payments shall be made via PayPal.
delivery_terms: Volume Discounts: 100 units - 500 units: 8.5% discount, 501 units - 1000 units: 15% discount, Over 1000 units: 20% discount.
termination_clause: Termination for Convenience: Either party may terminate this Contract with 60 days written notice to the other party. Termination for Cause: Either party may terminate this Contract immediately in the event of a material breach by the other party.
